name: Agent Media Group
tag_list: real-estate-marketing, website-design, idx, mls, insurance-web-design, seo, search-engine-optimization
overview:
Agent Media Group (AMG), located in Orange County, CA, offers all inclusive website development, including design, hosting and support. AMG provides consulting for Internet marketing/strategy, search engine optimization, e-learning and social media web 2.0 technologies. We take the time to learn what is important to our clients in order to achieve success. Our aim is to build the long-term relationships critical to a strong and lasting relationship. Industries we serve; corporate, small-large businesses, real estate, insurance, medical, nonprofit.

In addition to web development, AMG offers targeted design services, strategies and implementation programs. Our Real Estate & Insurance Website Consulting Division consists of a professional team of marketers - we offer online learning, consulting internet marketing and IDX technology solutions for all levels.
